EN:
BGram Updated To T6.0.1-B6.8.2
Stable

-Option for disable TOR notification removed.
-App was removed from forced dark mode.

BGram T6.0.1-B6.8.0:

โผ๏ธNote:
This version has major changes in codes, it is suggested to clean install.
By installing this version all BGram settings, e.g. tabs, hidden chats, favourite chats, etc. will be reverted to stock.
Do not restore the old backups, since they wonโt work.
Also, hidden reading removed according to Telegram request.

โข Source code updated to Telegram 6.0.1.
โข Tor codes and engine updated to Tor-0.4.2.5-rc.
โข Translation API in mini, full screen and text editor item.
โข Direct chats: now you can make new folder and set it as Direct chats, which will be shown in sidebar and as a tab. Syncing is supported.
โข Folder limitation had been increased, but only initial 10 folders will be synced.
โข Set custom icon for tabs.
โข Show or hide All tab.
โข Icon and text for tab all.
โข Swipe up and down actions for floating button.
โข Ability to disable go to next photo by edge tapping.
โข Ability to replace the New Message button with Saved Messages.
โข Maps preview forced to use Yandex.
โข Remove single item from search history.
โข Hide proxy sponsor.
โข Buttons for sending photo as a file and without grouping in attach panel.
โข Add member now moved to 3-dot menu in profile.
โข Pins are revert back to 5 pins for main tab.
